recipe.title: Ginger Mint Mojito Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 8 ; lime rinds, halved and squeezed, juice reserved for another use
1 oz ; lime rind simple syrup ; (30 mL)
4 ; fresh mint leaves, plus more for garnish

steps.step: In a medium bowl, combine the lime rinds and sugar. Toss to coat the rinds with the sugar, then cover. Let sit, stirring every 45 minutes, for about 4 hours, or until the sugar is completely dissolved and there’s syrup in the bottom of the bowl.
Strain the syrup through a fine-mesh sieve or cheesecloth, pushing to extract as much liquid as possible. Store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 months.
In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine the rum, lime juice, simple syrup, and mint leaves. Shake vigorously for 20 seconds.
Strain into a glass filled with ice and top with ginger beer.
Garnish with the slice of lime and mint leaves.
